description: This app, "How Do You Do This In SAS?", for HP TouchPad is a free introduction to a series of eBooks about SAS software programming focusing on frequently asked questions and answers, illustrated by code samples which can be sent by email directly from the app.  The series of ebooks has been designed to encourage users to contribute questions some of which will be included in future versions of the app.  There are controls to select specific questions, move to the previous or next question, decrease or increase the font to suit the user's preference, and send emails requesting answers to questions not yet included in that version of the eBook.
versionNote: 2.1.0: Moved Graphs from planned to published.  2.0.0: (1) Standardised text formatting, (2) Added Efficiency to published.  1.3.0: Added new book to Author section.  1.2.0: Moved Macros from planned to published.  1.1.0: (1) Added "What is SAS" page, (2) Moved SQL and EG from planned to published.
